components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
A microscope, as used in science laboratories to magnify small objects, such as cells or insects. Depicted as a compound opitical microscope with an adjustable eyepiece, lens, arm, and slide stage mounted on a base. Generally shown as metal with the viewing apparatus facing left.

Commonly used for various content concerning science and research. May also be used for various senses of inspection (e.g., taking a closer took).

Google’s design was previously shown in red.
components.title: Microscope

description: A woman who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences. Generally depicted wearing safety goggles and a white lab coat while holding a test tube filled with colorful liquid.
title: Woman Scientist

emoji_net_data.definition: The Woman Scientist emoji is a sequence of the ?? Woman and ?? Microscope emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each  http://emojipedia.org/female-scientist/
emoji_net_data.name: woman scientist

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00056996n: A person who studied natural philosophy
The objective study of nature and the physical universe before the development of modern science.
Natural philosophy or the philosophy of nature was the philosophical study of nature and the physical universe that was dominant before the development of modern science.
The study of matter, motion, and energy
The objective study of nature in the widest sense; science, (later especially) physics.
Physics is the natural science that involves the study of matter and its motion through space and time, along with related concepts such as energy and force.
Ancient philosophical study of nature and physical universe
The science of matter and energy and their interactions
The study of those aspects of nature which can be understood in a fundamental way in terms of elementary principles and laws.
Physics is the science of the natural world, which deals with the fundamental particles the universe is made of, the interactions between them, and the interactions of objects composed of them.
The branch of science concerned with the study of properties and interactions of space, time, matter and energy.

bn:03098987n: Person qualified or professionally engaged in engineering.

An engineer is a professional practitioner of engineering, concerned with applying scientific knowledge, mathematics, and ingenuity to develop solutions for technical, societal and commercial problems.
A person who is qualified or professionally engaged in any branch of engineering.
A profession that develops solutions to technical problems

bn:00010543n: The science that studies living organisms
A division of the natural sciences concerned with the study of life and living organisms.
The study of all life or living matter.
Biology is a natural science concerned with the study of life and living organisms, including their structure, function, growth, evolution, distribution, and taxonomy.

Biology deals with the study of the many living organisms E. coli, tree fern, gazelle, Goliath beetleBiology is a natural science concerned with the study of life and living organisms, including their structure, function, growth, evolution, distribution, and taxonomy.

bn:00053834n: Person with an extensive knowledge of mathematics
A mathematician is a person whose primary area of study and research is the field of mathematics.
A mathematician is a person with an extensive knowledge of mathematics who uses this knowledge in his work, typically to solve mathematical problems.

bn:00069680n: A scientist, in a broad sense, is one engaging in a systematic activity to acquire knowledge.
A person with advanced knowledge of one or more sciences

One whose activities make use of the scientific method to answer questions regarding the measurable universe. A scientist may be involved in original research, or make use of the results of the research of others.
Someone who uses the scientific method professionally
Expert in at least one area of science who uses the scientific method to do research.
One whose activities make use of scientific method.
Scientists, in a broad sense, are persons engaged in the systematic activity to acquire knowledge.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman scientist emoji is depicted with an air of thoughtful curiosity, adorned with a lab coat and often holding a beaker or test tube, all rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and detailed realism. Her focused expression and the subtle gleam on her scientific instruments, enhanced by realistic lighting, speak to innovation and discovery. The emoji‚Äôs soft rounded edges and polished finish make it a versatile symbol for STEM fields, research, or any pursuit of knowledge and understanding on Apple devices.
